mapper.sql: log_id, description, log_type, `method`, params, request_ip, `time`, username, phone, address, browser, exception_detail, create_time

log_type,

mapper.update:
update sys_log
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`time` = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
browser = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exception_detail = #{exceptionDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_log set description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browser = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exception_detail = #{exceptionDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
